title: Ignota's SCP-6208 Pixel Fanart
content:

margin-bottom: 15px;"]]
[[=]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/waOyTes.gif]]
++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7081478557016575278?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6208 SCP-6208]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6208.mp4, 6208.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7081478557016575278?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6208 by Elunerazim and Fishish
[[/<]]
-----

I LOVE this one. I know there's not as much animation as there normally is... which was completely intentional. I wanted it to feel empty because I mean... read the article.

Speaking of which, this is definitely my favorite entry out of all the dept-con articles I've read so far. It's just got such a fun vibe! It's simple, weird, and got all those little details that make my brain spark a little bit.

I FOR SURE do not think I understand it completely, even after reading all the other articles. I've got a few ideas, but that's part of the fun, right? Not knowing for sure.

Also I'm back hi.

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
